articles.author: Jack Bantock
articles.title: Ryder Cup 2023: How to watch Team USA’s attempt to finally end 30 years of hurt in Europe - CNN
articles.description: Scottie Scheffler was not even born the last time the United States won a Ryder Cup on European soil.
articles.content:
Scottie Scheffler was not even born the last time the United States won a Ryder Cup on European soil.
At the 44th edition of golfs biennial team tournament in Rome on Friday, the world No. 1 spearhe… [+3160 chars]
